name: Anamnesis (itch) (EduardoDCarneiro)
description:
New planets are discovered every month but humans don't dare explore them for themselves.

Different robots are sent in turn to explore these mysterious lands. Each of them has some kind of special attachment and the most important order of each mission is that in case of imminent death the robots must leave a memory connected to that attachment and eject it from the body so that the following robots can take advantage of them in later missions.

In this game, you will play as the Robot 4200-465, one of the simplest models produced, which only has a pistol. However, this is a very customizable robot so you will have the opportunity to try different combinations of attachments.

Will you be able to overcome all the challenges that the Spider-Island has for you? Or are you going to become just another lost memory?

Controls:
  • WASD to move;
  • Space Bar to jump;
  • Key I to open and close the inventory;
  • Left Mouse Button to control left arm attachment;
  • Right Mouse Button to control right arm attachment;
  • Middle Mouse Button to control head attachment;
  • Ctrl to control legs attachment;
  • Shift to control back attachment;
  • Esc to open the pause menu;
